reviewText: Not the best film made about Vietnam, but the cast includes many personal friends. It is a pleasure to watch these actors in their youth. Most noteworthy, the charactor named Senator, played by the truly talented Scott Utley.

Even Kill Zone, with Tony Dorsett(!) and Americana
are better! And that's saying something. If you
want David Carradine at his best, see Night Rythyms,
Deadly Survellience or Kung Fu!
